# Lunary

> A calm AI companion for cosmic self understanding. Personalised astrology based on real astronomical data, not generic horoscopes.

Lunary blends birth chart astrology, real-time moon phases, tarot, and lunar cycles into personal daily guidance. Built for people who want depth, not drama. Most astrology apps entertain you. Lunary helps you understand yourself.

## What Makes Lunary Different

- Uses NASA-grade Astronomy Engine for real planetary calculations
- Personalized insights based on your full birth chart, not just sun sign
- AI companion with memory that learns your patterns over time
- 500+ page digital grimoire covering crystals, spells, tarot, numerology, runes, chakras
- Community Moon Circles for new and full moon gatherings

## Documentation

- [About Lunary](https://lunary.app/welcome): Full introduction to what Lunary offers
- [Pricing](https://lunary.app/pricing): Subscription tiers and features
- [Help Center](https://lunary.app/help): FAQ and support
- [Press Kit](https://lunary.app/press-kit): Brand assets and founder information

## Core Features

- [Daily Horoscope](https://lunary.app/horoscope): Personalized transit-based daily insights
- [Tarot Reading](https://lunary.app/tarot): AI-powered personalized tarot with pattern analysis
- [Birth Chart Calculator](https://lunary.app/birth-chart): Full natal chart with house calculations
- [Book of Shadows](https://lunary.app/book-of-shadows): AI astro-tarot companion with memory
- [Moon Circles](https://lunary.app/moon-circles): Community lunar gathering insights
- [Cosmic Report Generator](https://lunary.app/cosmic-report-generator): Shareable PDF reports

## The Grimoire (Knowledge Library)

- [Grimoire Home](https://lunary.app/grimoire): 500+ page digital knowledge library
- [Zodiac Signs](https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac): All 12 signs with deep interpretations
- [Tarot Cards](https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot): 78 card meanings, spreads, and guides
- [Crystals](https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals): 100+ crystals with properties and uses
- [Numerology](https://lunary.app/grimoire/numerology): Angel numbers, life path, mirror hours
- [Spells & Rituals](https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells): Beginner to advanced workings
- [Moon Phases](https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon): Lunar cycle guidance and rituals
- [Runes](https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes): Elder Futhark meanings and divination
- [Chakras](https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras): Energy centers and healing
- [Wheel of the Year](https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year): Sabbat celebrations
- [Correspondences](https://lunary.app/grimoire/correspondences): Magical associations
- [Planetary Bodies](https://lunary.app/grimoire/planets): Astrological planet meanings
- [Houses](https://lunary.app/grimoire/houses): 12 astrological houses explained
- [Aspects](https://lunary.app/grimoire/aspects): Planetary aspect interpretations
- [Retrogrades](https://lunary.app/grimoire/retrogrades): Retrograde meanings and survival
- [Eclipses](https://lunary.app/grimoire/eclipses): Eclipse types and spiritual significance

## API (For GPT Actions)

- [Current Cosmic Conditions](https://lunary.app/api/gpt/cosmic): Moon phase, retrogrades, aspects
- [Daily Horoscope by Sign](https://lunary.app/api/gpt/horoscope): Sign-specific daily reading

## Subscription Tiers

- Free: Limited features, 3 AI messages/day
- Lunary+ ($4.99/mo): Core subscription, 50 AI messages/day
- Lunary+ Pro ($9.99/mo): Premium tier, 300 AI messages/day

## Technical

- Built with Next.js 15, React 18, TypeScript
- PostgreSQL database with Prisma ORM
- Astronomy Engine for real astronomical calculations
- OpenAI GPT-4o-mini for AI features
